underlying_goal: Fix __file__ undefined error in Databricks notebooks by switching to dbutils.notebook context-based path resolution, update skills/lint docs, and add CI checks
friction_detail: Initial grep pattern for CI check matched __file__ in comments, causing false positives that required multiple iterations to fix.
brief_summary: User asked Claude to implement a plan fixing __file__ errors in Databricks notebooks, update docs/CI, and create a PR; all was done successfully, but a new DBSQL syntax error issue in Databricks editor was raised and investigation was still in progress when session ended.
